commandDescription: Command for ignore metadata from your project. Use .ahignore.json file for perform this operation. This command will be delete the ignored metadata from your project folder
allFlagDescription: Ignore all metadata types according to the ignore file
typeFlagDescription: Ignore the specified metadata types according to the ignore file. You can select a sigle or a list separated by commas. This options does not take effect if you choose ignore all
ignoreFileFlagDescription: Path to the ignore file. Use this if you not want to use the project root ignore file or have different name. By default use %s file from your project root
compressFlagDescription: Add this option to compress modified files by ignore operation.
missingTypesToIgnoreError: You must select ignore all or ignore specific types
